seniority_level.evidence: 1-5 years of professional software development experience and 1+ years of data engineering experience mentioned, with no explicit senior title

job_family.evidence: Title includes 'Data Engineer' and responsibilities focus on data pipelines, workflows, and integrations within Palantir Foundry

sub_specialty.evidence: Palantir Foundry is mentioned as the core platform, but no specific focus on streaming, batch, or lakehouse paradigms is highlighted

leadership_expectation.evidence: Responsibilities include collaboration and pipeline development but no explicit mention of leadership, mentoring, or direct reports

primary_cloud.evidence: No explicit mention of cloud providers or services in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction

processing_paradigm.evidence: No explicit mention of streaming or batch tools like Kafka, Flink, Airflow, or Spark

orchestrator_category.evidence: Palantir Foundry is mentioned as the platform for workflows and pipelines, but no specific orchestrator category is identifiable

storage_layer.evidence: Palantir Foundry is mentioned, but no explicit storage layer (warehouse, lake, lakehouse) is detailed

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is stated as Berthoud, CO, but no explicit remote work model or restrictions are mentioned

timezone_focus.evidence: No timezone requirements or preferences are mentioned beyond location

relocation_required.evidence: Job posting does not mention relocation assistance or requirement, and states 'US CITIZENSHIP, PERMANENT RESIDENCY, REFUGEE OR ASYLUM STATUS IS REQUIRED' which implies residency is already established

h1b_friendly.evidence: Explicitly states 'US CITIZENSHIP, PERMANENT RESIDENCY, REFUGEE OR ASYLUM STATUS IS REQUIRED' and no visa sponsorship mentioned

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Work authorization requirements explicitly exclude OPT/CPT or student visa support

citizenship_required.evidence: US Citizenship or Permanent Residency (green card) explicitly required for security clearance eligibility

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position with benefits mentioned implies W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: Benefits include unlimited PTO, paid parental leave, medical/dental/vision insurance, HSA/FSA, disability/life insurance, 401(k) options, equity grants, and EAP program

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'growth as a propulsion manufacturing company' and 'opportunities for system optimization' which suggest career growth but no explicit tracks

mentorship_signals.evidence: Collaboration with Product Owner and other Software & Data Engineers suggests mentorship opportunities

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotion paths or advancement tracks

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal mobility or lateral moves in the job posting

career_tracks_available.evidence: No explicit career tracks mentioned for IC, management, specialist, or architect roles

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between required ('US Citizenship or Permanent Residency', 'Palantir Foundry experience') and desired ('manufacturing, industrial systems, or IoT data') qualifications

scope_definition.evidence: Job responsibilities and required skills are well-defined and focused on Palantir Foundry and data engineering tasks

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Years of experience (1-5 for software, 1+ for data engineering) align reasonably with mid-level seniority expectations
